short_summary: Supply major naval shipyard goods and hardware
full_summary:
**Contract Opportunity Notice**
### Brief Description

The Department of National Defence is inviting proposal submissions for the procurement of wedges and joint setting items to support the maintenance and repair of Royal Canadian Navy ships.

### Delivery Locations

The expected delivery locations are:

* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

### Items Required

The department requires the following items:

* 9 units of Wedge, Top, Joint Setting (Item #1)
* 6 units of Wedge, Top, Joint Setting (Item #2)
* 9 units of Wedge, Bottom, Joint Setting (Item #3)
* 6 units of Wedge, Bottom, Joint Setting (Item #4)

### Description

All items are to be delivered to the respective CFBs and must meet the specified quality and quantity requirements. Suppliers are required to indicate the brand name, model, and/or part number of the proposed equivalent or substitute products.

### Preference and Evaluation Criteria

A preference may be given to suppliers offering Canadian goods and/or services. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

### Documents and Attachments

The following documents are available for download:

* Amendment #1
* Amendment #2
* Amendment #3
* Request for Proposal (RFP) Document

All documents can be found on the Canada Buy and Sell website at the specified URLs.

### Contact Information

If you have any questions or require additional information, please contact Katerina Drescher, Contracting Officer at:
katerina.drescher@forces.gc.ca

### Closing Date and Time

The tender closing date and time is October 12, 2022, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time. Late submissions will not be accepted.

Note: Since the original document was in a mixed English-French format, I kept both versions of the text where applicable. However, please keep in mind that the rewritten entry is in English, and any translations were maintained for completeness purposes only.
